column4: I need to know, in the ubuntu /boot directory, should vmlinuz be named "vmlinuz" or "vmlinuz-2.6.12-9-386"
and /vmlinuz is a symbolic link to it
nickrud :: I'm getting errors from grub saying that vmlinuz doesnt exist
if it helps, my (dapper) kernel line is "kernel          /boot/vmlinuz-2.6.15-15-386 root=/dev/hda4 ro quiet splash"
